name: Michael Schumacher Racing World Kart 2002
description:
Michael Schumacher Racing World Kart 2002 is a racing-arcade game developed by Radon Labs, TerraTools Computer Creations and Nebula Device. It was originally released in 2002. JoWooD Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Michael Schumacher Racing World Kart 2002 is available on PlayStation and PC.
